005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
016import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.regex.Matcher;
019import java.util.regex.Pattern;
020
021import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public class DateWithTZAdapter
026    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<ZonedDateTime, IDateItem> {
027  @NonNull
028  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
029      List.of(
030          new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "date-with-timezone")));
031  private static final Pattern DATE_TIMEZONE = Pattern.compile("^("
032      + "^(?:(?:2000|2400|2800|(?:19|2[0-9](?:0[48]|[2468][048]|[13579][26])))-02-29)"
033      + "|(?:(?:(?:19|2[0-9])[0-9]{2})-02-(?:0[1-9]|1[0-9]|2[0-8]))"
034      + "|(?:(?:(?:19|2[0-9])[0-9]{2})-(?:0[13578]|10|12)-(?:0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01]))"
035      + "|(?:(?:(?:19|2[0-9])[0-9]{2})-(?:0[469]|11)-(?:0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|30))"
036      + ")"
037      + "(Z|[+-][0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})$");
038
039  DateWithTZAdapter() {
040    super(ZonedDateTime.class);
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public List<QName> getNames() {
045    return NAMES;
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
050    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
051  }
052
053  @SuppressWarnings("null")
054  @Override
055  public ZonedDateTime parse(String value) {
056    Matcher matcher = DATE_TIMEZONE.matcher(value);
057    if (!matcher.matches()) {
058      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid date: " + value);
059    }
060    String parseValue = String.format("%sT00:00:00%s", matcher.group(1), matcher.group(2));
061    try {
062      return ZonedDateTime.from(DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.parse(parseValue));
063    } catch (DateTimeParseException ex) {
064      throw new IllegalArgumentException(ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
065    }
066  }
067
068  @SuppressWarnings("null")
069  @Override
070  public String asString(Object value) {
071    return DateFormats.DATE_WITH_TZ.format((ZonedDateTime) value);
072  }
073
074  @SuppressWarnings("null")
075  @Override
076  public ZonedDateTime copy(Object obj) {
077    return ZonedDateTime.from((ZonedDateTime) obj);
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  public Class<IDateItem> getItemClass() {
082    return IDateItem.class;
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  public IDateItem newItem(Object value) {
087    ZonedDateTime item = toValue(value);
088    return IDateItem.valueOf(item);
089  }
090}
